nodes.bodyText: Can we make this not private, and then add a unittest for this method?

There is a general lack of unit tests for most methods here.. That is partially because I don't have a good understanding of the full API spec quite yet and I plan to add them later as I implement more and have a better understanding of the spec.
Ok, as long as we don't forget to add the coverage soon.
What exactly is the concept of a bucket in the Alluxio proxy?
Bucket in the concept of alluxio is the folders in the root mount (/). This means that if there are files at root (/), there will be no way to view it using the S3 API.

We may need to update the behavior in the future.
Another possibility is that we always have a "root" bucket which just holds the files under root, and the directories under root are just separate buckets.
In any case, I don't think there is a clear spec for this currently, so we may have to be flexible in the future.
